name: Dabee Brazil, Ltda.
description: Developer of an online digital payment platform intended to manage fleet expenses and allow users to make secure, simple e-payments. The company's platform monitors all transactions in real-time and accesses insights for the fleet's fuel-related tasks saving costs and improving operations, enabling drivers, fleet managers, finance departments and owners to receive data accuracy, transparency and simplicity and manage their fleet effectively.
